H0.text: The Isle of Capri is close to which Italian resort. Amalfi

H1.text: The Isle of Capri is close to which Italian resort. Positano

H2.text: The Isle of Capri is close to which Italian resort. Naples

H3.text: The Isle of Capri is close to which Italian resort. Sorrento

A4.text: Capri is located approximately 5 km from the mainland tip of the Sorrento Peninsula.

A5.text: The Sorrentine Peninsula has views of Naples, Vesuvius and the Isle of Capri.

A6.text: Ferries and hydrofoils connect the city to Naples, Amalfi, Positano, Capri and Ischia.
